cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Includes Air Con, Linen and Locker, with deposit box. Bunk beds in room. Toilets and Showers located close to all rooms.
**Nightly Rate**  Check SPECIALS for **WEEKLY RATE**.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Includes Air Con, Queen size bed with linen. Ceiling fan,Ceiling fan, Fridge, Internet access, Satellite / cable TV, Towels, Toilets and Showers located close to all rooms.
**Nightly Rate**  Check SPECIALS for **WEEKLY RATE**

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
